```{r}
library(serodynamics)
library(rjags)
library(runjags)
runjags::findJAGS()
```

```{r "run-dobson-model"}

data1 <- rbinom(n = 91, size = 1, prob = .6)
set.seed(1)
jags_post0 <- run.jags(
  inits = initsfunction,
  model = serodynamics_example("model.dobson.jags"),
  data = list(r = data1, N = length(data1)),
  monitor = "p"
)

jags_post0$mcmc |> as.array() |> head()
```
